FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the Requestor or Publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: C2CX-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the type of information being transferred between the Components

FIELD.NAME: MY-ROLE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Role the reporting component has in the configuration. E.g. PRIMARY, BACKUP, AGENT, SERVER, MEMBER, MGR, ...

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-ASSOCS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The number of associations to be reported.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: ASSOC.n.GROUP
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of associated component or group

FIELD.NAME: ASSOC.n.NODE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Location of associated component or group

FIELD.NAME: ASSOC.n.ROLE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Role the associated component or group has, if known

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields
